actions.condition: T0_vigilance != null && T0_cough_or_throat_clearing != null && T0_saliva_swallow != null && T0_drooling != null && T0_voice_change != null
assignments: T0_preliminary_investigation = T0_vigilance + T0_cough_or_throat_clearing + T0_saliva_swallow + T0_drooling + T0_voice_change
actions.name: Preliminary Investigation

actions.condition: T0_deglutition != null && T0_cough_involuntary != null && T0_drooling_1 != null && T0_voice_change_1
actions.name: Semisolid Investigation

actions.condition: T0_deglutition_1 != null && T0_cough_involuntary_1 != null && T0_drooling_2 != null && T0_voice_change_2 != null
actions.name: Liquid Investigation

actions.condition: T0_deglutition_2 != null && T0_cough_involuntary_2 != null && T0_drooling_3 != null && T0_voice_change_3 != null
actions.name: Solid Investigation

actions.condition: T0_preliminary_investigation != null && T0_semisolid_investigation_score != null && T0_liquid_investigation_score != null && T0_solid_investigation_score != null
assignments: T0_total_score = T0_vigilance + T0_cough_or_throat_clearing + T0_saliva_swallow + T0_drooling + T0_voice_change + T0_deglutition + T0_deglutition_1 + T0_deglutition_2 + T0_cough_involuntary + T0_cough_involuntary_1 + T0_cough_involuntary_2 + T0_drooling_1 + T0_drooling_2 + T0_drooling_3 + T0_voice_change_1 + T0_voice_change_2 + T0_voice_change_3
actions.name: Total Score

guidelines.condition: T0_vigilance && T0_cough_or_throat_clearing && T0_saliva_swallow && T0_drooling && T0_voice_change && T0_preliminary_investigation && T0_deglutition.hidden && T0_deglutition_1 && T0_deglutition_2 && T0_cough_involuntary && T0_cough_involuntary_1 && T0_cough_involuntary_2 && T0_drooling_1 && T0_drooling_2 && T0_drooling_3 && T0_voice_change_1 && T0_voice_change_2 && T0_voice_change_3 && T0_semisolid_investigation_score && T0_solid_investigation_score && T0_liquid_investigation_score && T0_total_score

[name='T0_vigilance'].label: Vigilance
[name='T0_vigilance'].information: The patient must be alert for at least 15 minutes.

[name='T0_cough_or_throat_clearing'].label: Cough or Throat Clearing
[name='T0_cough_or_throat_clearing'].information:
***Voluntary ***cough.****The patient should cough or clear his or her throat <u>twice</u>

.

[name='T0_saliva_swallow'].label: Saliva Swallow
[name='T0_saliva_swallow'].information: Was the swallowing of saliva successful?

[name='T0_voice_change'].label: Voice Change
[name='T0_voice_change'].information: Did the voice change after swallowing? Was it hoarse, gurgly, coated, or weak?

[name='T0_deglutition'].label: Deglutition
[name='T0_deglutition'].information: \*Swallowing delayed means the delay is greater than 2 seconds.

[name='T0_cough_involuntary'].label: Cough (Involuntary)
[name='T0_cough_involuntary'].information: \*before, during, or after swallowing - until 3 minutes later.

[name='T0_deglutition_1'].label: Deglutition
[name='T0_deglutition_1'].information: \*Swallowing delayed means the delay is greater than 2 seconds.

[name='T0_cough_involuntary_1'].label: Cough (Involuntary)
[name='T0_cough_involuntary_1'].information: \*before, during, or after swallowing - until 3 minutes later.

[name='T0_deglutition_2'].label: Deglutition
[name='T0_deglutition_2'].information: \*Swallowing delayed means the delay is greater than 10 seconds for solids.

[name='T0_cough_involuntary_2'].label: Cough (Involuntary)
[name='T0_cough_involuntary_2'].information: \*before, during, or after swallowing - until 3 minutes later.

#DateTime.label: Date and Time of Test
#DateTime.information: Record the time when the test was initiated.

[name='input_text'].label: Patient Name
[name='input_text'].information: Patient's full name as it would appear in government ID or passport.

[name='input_text_1'].label: Patient ID
[name='input_text_1'].information: Add Personnummer (Swedish Patients) or other government ID number.
